To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Double attack
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Menasor walks towards Astroblast, a huge tremor forming with each step. He
moves ungainly towards his comrade, he then looks down at his prisoner, and
removes one of his hands, still holding Condor tightly in his other. With
his free hand he brings it down on Condor's head, as weakly as possible to
avoid killing the bot. (I basically want to knock you out).
